doc:
Fred Melamed https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fred_Melamed 0 Fred Melamed (born May 13, 1956) is an American actor, comedian,and writer. He is best known for portraying Sy Ableman in A Serious Man, Bruce Ben-Bacharach in Lady Dynamite, Sam Soto in In a World..., and for appearing in seven films directed by Woody Allen. Fred_Melamed ( born May_13_,_1956 ) is an_American_actor , comedian , and writer . He is_best_known for portraying Sy_Ableman in A_Serious_Man , Bruce_Ben-Bacharach in Lady_Dynamite , Sam_Soto in In a_World ... , and for appearing in_seven_films directed by Woody_Allen .
